publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4164 Malcolm Chisholm: Strategy for an Ageing Population—That the Parliament acknowledges the changing age structure of Scotland’s population and the benefits and opportunities it brings; values the enormous contribution of older people as volunteers, carers, workers and in many other ways; recognises the need to challenge stereotypes of older people and support them to contribute in ways which they choose; supports the further development of effective integrated services for older people, and welcomes the consultation and ongoing work currently being carried out to develop a Strategy for a Scotland with an Ageing Population. Supported by: Johann Lamont*
